name: Lightning Engine
description:
Car Drift Racing Game 

Drift and race through multiple maps. You can even play together in the newly added "Multiplayer Mode" (not in beta)

If you dont have any friends (like me) than you can play agains't an AI developed by me. (not in beta)

Be aware that this is just a buggy beta version. Release Date: May 27th (My birthday)

AzEStudios 2022 ©

https://azestudios.net/

EULA:

Please don't republish/sell my game or any content in it. 

The music and all of the code is 100% owned by us, except for the car models (mentioned below).

Please don't steal or try to find the source code of this game.

You are allowed to play it and show it to friends, but not call it your own or pirate it.
